item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>You should have been listening to Radio 2, where they ran a one hour story about France leaving the Euro and joining the £. Many "disgusted of Tnubridge" were keeping the lines busy with furious responses!! Dad really enjoyed his morning!!</p>
item.content:encoded: You should have been listening to Radio 2, where they ran a one hour story about France leaving the Euro and joining the £. Many “disgusted of Tnubridge” were keeping the lines busy with furious responses!! Dad really enjoyed his morning!!
